tip.title: Reduce Plastic Usage
tip.description: Use reusable bags, bottles, and containers to minimize plastic waste.

tip.title: Conserve Water
tip.description: Turn off taps when not in use and fix leaks to save water.

tip.title: Adopt Renewable Energy
tip.description: Install solar panels or opt for green energy suppliers to reduce your carbon footprint.

tip.title: Plant More Trees
tip.description: Trees absorb CO2 and provide oxygen. Make tree plantation part of your routine.
